alert.note: Alert for Coastal Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Glynn County through 445 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Country Club Estates, or near St. Simons Island. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, minor flooding due to heavy rainfall, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates and Sea Island. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
